name: Agony-Chapter 1
description:
This game was originally made on scratch by an awesome game dev named severeradiation, it was up for a few hours on scratch but eventually got taken down, but luckily I went inside the project and downloaded the project and I asked myself "hey what if I turn this scratch game into an app for windows, so I did, and I wanted to publish it so I got permission, by the way here he is https://scratch.mit.edu/users/severeradiation/ 

also its fine to run the game, there's no virus even though it says windows threat, its just warning you because it says it was made by an unknown publisher, which is not true because well severeradiation made the game, ok enjoy the game!
